participant_1.background:
I remember the warmth of the other orphans when we huddled together for warmth at night.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
so i started a small business.
i live alone with my dog.
I have a baby mobile that plays the Lumineers' songs.

participant_2.background:
I bought a book that would help me learn more about myself.
my favorite show is tom and jerry.
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.
I enjoy going outside to collect mushrooms, and my family is very supportive of this interest.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just got home from work and I'm about to watch some anime.
That sounds fun! I'm doing well too. I'm just hanging out with my dog.
Nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Bailey. He's the best dog ever!
Aww, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and cute.
They sure are! He's such a good boy.
I bet he is! What's your favorite thing about him?
My favorite thing about him is his personality. He's always happy and loving.
That's so sweet! I love dogs that are always happy.
It sounds like you two are really close.
That's so great! I wish I had a dog like that.
I'm sure you'll find a dog that's perfect for you one day.
